name: Cakma Yılan (Imitation Snake)
description:
A classic Snake clone for Android which I have made with Godot Engine. Features a speed setting, end-game messages depending on the score, and a snake which doesn't even look like one, hence the name "Cakma Yılan (Imitation Snake)". Doesn't feature sound. Might recieve some size optimizations in the future.

The game is only in Turkish for now, but you can find English subtitles in the featured gameplay video.

Source code: https://github.com/KiwoTez/cakma_yilan
